Tucson Prime cooperates with Perceptor, yet Night Shift still can not help =
but give into his flaws.  His attitude and demeanor being two of them.  He =
gives Percetor a dirty look, rather than the placid look of his leader.

"W=
hat I wouldn't do ta run over your sorry aft right now, Predacreep."

Tucso=
n rasies a brow.

" Night Shift, careful."

Night Shift nodds.

"I know I k=
now.  Watch my mouth before it runs off with me.  Gotchya.  But this punk a=
ft son of a slag ball wants me ta move faster, and the only way I can move =
faster is on wheels."

He walks a bit faster, with his hands behind his bac=
k.

"That's if I wasn't tied up.  Slag, I hate it when I can't transform."
=

Tucson Prime's gears were turning.  Perhaps not pysically but mentally.  H=
e looks to Hydras.

" Perhaps you should have Rodimus keep an eye on my cel=
l?  You never know, I've been known to pull many surprises on you Hydras, a=
nd surely there is the assumption that I'd never pull a crazy stunt like th=
e one I just pulled with him around would I?  No, not me.  I know better th=
an that."

Tucson Prime knew how to play a good mind game, as he attempts t=
o play one now.

he area, I suggest you retreat immediately, I repeat, retreat immediately."=

cts of the bean pods, ferments in his stomach, as Rat Trap pinches his nose=
.

edacon who tries to tail me."

hortcut and attempts to pull away from the fortress parameter.

"

y turns to Hydras.

fore having to be separated from them.
